Publications

Here is a list of all the articles I've published. In total I have written 5 articles.

  • An automatic classification of metaplasia in gastric histopathology images

    Mauricio Caviedes, Fabian Cano, David Becerra, Angel Cruz-Roa, Eduardo Romero

    Published in: 2023 IEEE 19th International Symposium on Medical Information Processing and Analysis (SIPAIM)

    November 15, 2023

  • Ensemble of Unsupervised Learned Image Representations Based On Variational Autoencoders for Lung Adenocarcinoma Subtype Differentiation

    Fabian Cano, Charlems Alvarez-Jimenez, Eduardo Romero, Angel Cruz-Roa

    Published in: 2023 IEEE 20th International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging (ISBI)

    September 1, 2023

  • A supervised subtype differentiation learning for building invariant features of non-small cell lung cancer in a latent space of a Variational Autoencoder

    Fabian Cano, Charlens Alvarez-Jimenez, David Becerra, Andres Siabatto, Angel Cruz-Roa, Eduardo Romero

    Published in: Proc. SPIE 12088 17th International Symposium on Medical Information Processing and Analysis

    December 10, 2021

  • An exploratory study of one-shot learning using Siamese convolutional neural network for histopathology image classification in breast cancer from few data examples

    Fabian Cano, Angel Cruz-Roa

    Published in: Proc. SPIE 11330 15th International Symposium on Medical Information Processing and Analysis

    January 3, 2020

  • A comparative analysis of sensitivity of convolutional neural networks for histopathology image classification in breast cancer

    Fabian Cano, Anant Madabhushi, Angel Cruz-Roa

    Published in: Proc. SPIE 10975 14th International Symposium on Medical Information Processing and Analysis

    December 21, 2018
